message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I understand the value of the product might be higher to you, but considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $115 for the product.
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $125. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
